short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Exelero Airlift plugin is useful to source candidates with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Exelero Airlift plugin is a free Chrome extension that comes with your Airlift account. It will be very useful in sourcing candidates on their favorite platforms all over the internet.
